intro: A tricky puzzle game about strategy, snacking, and survival. Guide adorable animals as they munch on fruit, and sometimes each other, to squeeze into their hiding spots!
description:
Munchy Mammals is a tricky puzzle game about strategy, snacking, and survival. Guide adorable animals of various lengths as they munch on fruit—and sometimes each other—to squeeze into their hiding spots!

As the player, you'll need to plan their moves carefully. Each mammal has unique skills and diets, from gentle herbivores to meat-loving carnivores, adding a delicious twist to every puzzle.

With over 60 challenging levels, evolving creatures, and a level editor for endless new challenges, Munchy Mammals will keep you thinking and munching. Ready to outsmart the food chain?

Level Editor:
Think you’ve mastered all 60+ levels? Test your skills with endless player-made puzzles, and collect more gold medals than any muncher before! With fresh levels added regularly, the challenges never end.

Unleash your creativity and design your own levels to share with the world.

Features:
- 60+ mind-bending puzzles with increasing difficulty
- 5 different areas with unique art
- Minimalist design; no keys, boxes, or doors to distract from the puzzles
- Move tracker & medals for the perfectionists
- Fully-featured Level Editor to create and share your own puzzles
- Endless new levels from players around the world in the level browser
